metadata.title: Nano Banana Studio: Free AI Image Generator (No Signup)
metadata.description: Turn text into stunning images in seconds with Nano Banana. Powered by Google Gemini — 5 free generations, 10+ art styles, image-to-image editing. The free Midjourney & DALL-E alternative creators love.
metadata.keywords: free AI image generator, best AI art generator 2026, text to image AI, Midjourney alternative free, DALL-E alternative, AI photo editor online, AI image creation tool, Nano Banana Studio, Gemini image generator

hero.title: Nano Banana Studio - Create AI Images in Seconds
hero.description: No design skills needed. Just describe what you want, pick a style, and watch your ideas come to life.
hero.tip: 5 free generations to start • No credit card required

features.title: Why Creators Love Us
features.description: Everything you need to create amazing AI images, nothing you don't.

items.title: Prompt Inspirations
items.description: No need to learn prompt engineering. Click any inspiration card and start creating instantly.

items.title: Style Presets
items.description: One-click styles: cyberpunk, Miyazaki, realistic, and more. No complex prompts required.

items.title: Personal Gallery
items.description: All your creations saved automatically. No more searching through chat history.

items.title: Image-to-Image
items.description: Upload a reference image and describe changes. Streamlined workflow, not buried in menus.

items.title: Before/After Compare
items.description: Built-in slider tool to compare edits. See your transformation at a glance.

items.title: Multilingual Support
items.description: Full English & Chinese interface. Create with prompts in your native language.

usage.title: How It Works
usage.description: Create amazing AI images in three simple steps:

items.title: 1. Choose Your Mode
items.description: Select text-to-image to create from scratch, or image-editing to transform an existing photo.

items.title: 2. Describe Your Vision
items.description: Type what you want in natural language. Pick a style like cyberpunk, anime, or realistic.

items.title: 3. Generate & Download
items.description: Click generate and get your AI-created image in seconds. Download and use anywhere.

prompt_inspirations.label: Inspiration
prompt_inspirations.title: Prompt Inspirations
prompt_inspirations.description: Get inspired and start creating with one click. Try these popular prompts or create your own.

use_cases.title: What You Can Create
use_cases.description: See how Nano Banana Studio can help bring your creative projects to life.

pricing_preview.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing_preview.description: Start free, upgrade when you need more.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have more questions? Contact us anytime.

items.question: What is Nano Banana Studio?
items.answer: Nano Banana Studio is an AI-powered image generator and editor that uses natural language. Simply describe what you want, and our AI creates or transforms images for you.

items.question: What AI model do you use?
items.answer: We use state-of-the-art AI models to generate high-quality images. Our technology is constantly updated to deliver the best results.

items.question: What makes Nano Banana Studio different?
items.answer: We're purpose-built for image creation. Prompt inspirations help you get started, style presets give you one-click creative options, and your personal gallery saves everything automatically. No digging through chat history.

items.question: Do I need design skills?
items.answer: Not at all! Just describe what you want in plain English. Our AI understands natural language and converts your words into stunning visuals.

items.question: What styles are available?
items.answer: We offer multiple artistic styles including cyberpunk, Miyazaki/anime, realistic, and more. You can also use custom prompts for unique styles.

items.question: How does the free tier work?
items.answer: New users get 5 free image generations to try the service. After that, you can upgrade to a paid plan for unlimited creativity.

items.question: Can I use the images commercially?
items.answer: Yes, images you create with Nano Banana Studio are yours to use for personal or commercial projects.

cta.title: Ready to Create Amazing Images?
cta.description: Start generating AI images for free. No credit card required.
